SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AlreadyInGameException
Exception that represents that a player is already in game
AnsiEscapeCodes
This class contains the ANSI escape codes with 24 bit color
App
This is the main application launched from the jar
BoardConstants
This class contains all the constants related to the board
ChatAllMessage
This class represent a message to send a public chat message
ChatAllResponse
This class represents the response to a ChatAll message
ChatReceiveMessage
This class represents the chat message htat the client is supposed to receive
ChatSomeoneMessage
This class represent the chat someone message
ChatSomeoneResponse
This class represents the response to a ChatSomeone message
ChooseNicknameMessage
This class represents a message to choose the nickname
ChooseNicknameResponse
This method represents the response to a ChooseNickname message
CLI
This class is used to represent the CLI view of the game
ClickableComponent
This class is a utility used for wrapping a lot of gui components into a single big component that can be resized, clicked and performed actions on
ClickableComponentSetup
This enum contains all the information for the correct setup of the clickable component class
Client
This is the client interface, it makes the communication protocol transparent to the rest of the program
ClientHandler
This is the abstract class that handles the client server side
CommonGoal
This is the class that represents the common goal It is abstract since every goal will be an extension of this class following the pattern Strategy, overriding the method for the evaluation of the goal
CommonGoalFactory
This class is a factory that creates common goals
ConnectionError
Exception that represents an error during a remote connection
CreateGameMessage
This class represents a message to create a game
CreateGameResponse
This method represents the response to a CreateGame message
EightTilesOfTheSameColor
This class implements the sixth common goal: 8 cards of the same color anywhere in the library
ExistentNicknameException
Exception that represents that a nickname already exists
GameBoard
This is the class used for the simulation of the physical game board.
GameBoardConfiguration
This class is just a utility used for storing the loaded data from the config file
GameController
this class is the controller of the pattern modern-view-controller; it accepts inputs and calls method from class gameModel
GameEndedException
Exception that arises if a game has ended and a client tries to make moves
GameEndedScore
this class represents the "data structure" useful to create the final leaderboard of the game (which is a list gameEnded objects)
GameInfo
This immutable class is used for transferring the data to be updated from the server to the client
GameModel
this class is the main class of the model : it contains the methods called by the Controller and in this class there are all the methods that implement the logic of the game (check of a move, the logic of the turns, the final leaderboard ...)
GameViewController
This class is the whole controller of the game scene
GetLobbiesMessage
Message used to ask the server for the list of lobbies
GetLobbiesResponse
This class represents the response to a GetLobbies message
GUILauncher
This class is used to launch the application in gui mode
GUIView
This class is the view utilized by the application in gui mode
HelloController
This class is the controller for all the interactions of the user before entering a game
IllegalNicknameException
Exception that represents that a nickname is illegal
InvalidMoveException
this exception is thrown by the class gameController if the move done by the player is wrong
InvalidNicknameException
this exception is thrown by the class gameController if the nickname of the currentPlayer is wrong
JoinGameMessage
This class represents a message to join the game
JoinGameResponse
This method represents the response to a JoinGame message
JsonWithExposeSingleton
Singleton used to get a gson object to parse json files
Ladder
This class implements the twelve common goal: ladder in the tile
Lobby
This class represents a Lobby to be sent to the client as part of a list
LobbyFullException
This exception is thrown when the lobby is full
LobbyRecovered
This class represents a Recovered Lobby
LobbyServer
This class sets up the main server which will make the player set his name and choose a game to join
LobbyServerConfig
This class contains all the information for the correct setup of the server It can also be loaded from file
LobbyStandard
This class represents a Standard lobby
Lock
this class works as a Lock and also as a bridge between the outgoing and ingoing TCP messages
MakeMoveMessage
This class represents a message to make a move
MakeMoveResponse
This class represents a response to a MakeMoveMessage
MatchServer
This class represents the server that manages a game
Message
This class represents a message that is sent over tcp
ModelConstants
This class is used to store all the constant values needed by the classes of the game model
MyStack
This class simulates a stack
NGroupsOfSizeM
This class implements the first and second common goal: N group of M tiles of the same color (different groups can have different colors)
NGroupsOfSizeMConfiguration
This class is just a utility used for storing the loaded data from the config file
NLinesOfAtMostMDifferentColors
This class implements the fifth, eighth, ninth and tenth common goal: N lines of tiles of at most M different colors
NLinesOfAtMostMDifferentColorsConfiguration
This class is just a utility used for storing the loaded data from the config file
NoGamesAvailableException
Exception that represents that no game are available
NoGameToRecoverException
Exception that represents that there are no games available for recovery / joining a recovered game with your name
NoMoreTilesAtStartFillBoardException
Exception thrown whenever there are no more tiles to fill the board and someone tries to fill it again
NoMoreTilesToFillBoardException
Exception thrown whenever there are no more tiles to fill the board while filling the board
NonExistentNicknameException
Exception that represents that a nickname does not exist
Observer
Interface for observer method
PersonalGoal
This is the class containing all the information for the storage of a single personal goal
PersonalGoalsConfiguration
This class is just a utility used for storing the loaded data from the config file
PingClientMessage
This class represents a message to ask the server if he is alive (ping)
PingClientResponse
The class represents the response to a IsServerAlive message
PlayerInfo
This immutable class is used for transferring the data to be updated from the server to the client
PlayerState
this class represents a generic player of the match
Position
this class represent the position of a specific tile in the game board
RandomSingleton
Singleton used to get a random number generator
RealGUILauncher
This class launches the application in gui mode
RecoverGameMessage
This class represents a message to recover a game
RecoverGameResponse
This class represents the recover game response message
RmiClient
This class represents a client that uses the rmi connection protocol
RmiClientHandler
This is the class that handles the tcp client server side
RmiClientInterface
This is the Rmi Interface for the client
RMILobbyServerInterface
This interface contains the methods that can be called by the client on the Lobby Server
RmiServerInterface
This interface contains the methods that can be called by the client on the MatchServer
ServerConstants
This class contains all the constants related to the server
ServerLauncher
This class is used to launch the application in server mode
Shelf
This class represent the shelf of one of the player
SingleGoal
this class represents the specific single goal.
SingleOccurrenceOfGivenShape
This class implements the third, seventh and eleventh common goal: check if a given shape is present in the board (four corners, diagonal, cross)
SingleOccurrenceOfGivenShapeConfiguration
This class is just a utility used for storing the loaded data from the config file
State
This enum is used to store the state of the game
TcpClient
This class represents a client that uses the tcp connection protocol
TcpClientHandler
This class manages all the inbound and outgoing communication between the client and the server
Tile
this class represents the single tile of the game
TileColor
This class contains all the possible color value for the tiles of the game; color "Empty" represents a position of the board which is empty, but it can contain a card; color "Invalid" represents a position which is not part of the board
TimeOutException
Exception that arises if the server is too slow to respond to the client
TwoSquares
This class implements the fourth common goal: two squares 2x2 of the same color
UpdateMessage
This class represents a message to update the client
UtilityFunctions
This class is a utility for loading files from the resources directory
UtilityFunctionsModel
This class is used to contain utility functions that will be used in different part of the program
View
This abstract class is used to represent the view of the game; it will be extended in class Cli and Gui, the real view of the game
ViewConstants
This class contains the constants used by the CLI
ViewLauncher
This class is used to launch the application in client mode
VirtualView
This class is used for storing the information relative to the current game state which has to be sent to each client that is currently playing the game
WrongLobbyIndexException
Exception that arises if the client tries to join a lobby that doesn't exist
